biocontainers.name: bioconductor-lpnet
biocontainers.summary: This tool aims at infering biological networks, in particular signaling and gene networks. for that it takes perturbation data, either steady-state or time-series, as input and generates an lp model which allows the inference of signaling networks. for parameter identification either leave-one-out cross-validation or stratified n-fold cross-validation can be used.
